lia.util.geo
Class iNetGeoClient

java.lang.Object
  lia.util.geo.iNetGeoClient
public class iNetGeoClient
extends java.lang.Object

This class is used to get info about a link. For a link name, the following info is filled: source&dest ip, city, country, longitude, and latitude.

          This function is normally called to get info about a link.

          Get from the config file geo info about the node that has a given ip address

Constructor Detail

iNetGeoClient

public iNetGeoClient()
Method Detail

loadConfig

public void loadConfig()
This function reads the config file and resets the links cache. Can be called to reread the config.

getLink

public ILink getLink(java.lang.String linkName)
This function is normally called to get info about a link.

Parameters:
linkName - is the name of the link for which the info should be retreived.
Returns:
ILink with all fields filled or null if nothing is found about this link.

getNodeGeo

public java.util.Hashtable getNodeGeo(java.lang.String ipAddress)
Get from the config file geo info about the node that has a given ip address

Parameters:
ipAddress - the ip address of the node
Returns:
a hashtable with the COUNTRY, CITY, LONG, LAT attributes or null if not found
